p: To extract the ethanolic extract (EE), the air‐dried parts of F. angulata were pulverized into the powdered form. The dried powder (30 g) was extracted by the maceration method with ethanol (EtOH), and separately at room temperature, and the solvents from the combined extracts were evaporated by the rotary system (Mottaghipisheh et al., 2014).
